thread.section_title: www.uberchild.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.uberchild.com | uberchild.com
thread.title: Susan David

author: Susan David
title: Susan David
text:
I wanted to buy two isofix seats from the leading brand but these are half the price and I'd recommend them to anyone looking to buy sturdy and well built seats.
They are super padded but without being bulky. Covers are top notch, stylish and more easily removed than on many I've seen when requiring a wash, with a strong zip on the back.
I love that they have a built in isofix as they seem more safe than fixing with seat belts. The optional added cup holder is actually accessible for young toddlers too.
Overall I am extremely pleased.
